lead_paragraph: The retailer said its results were hurt by a decline in book sales in addition to expenses for its Nook digital reader.
snippet: The retailer said its results were hurt by a decline in book sales in addition to expenses for its Nook digital reader.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble Posts Loss Despite Strong Nook Sales
